flawed_nl_solution:
The total amount spent on food is $40 + $15 + $25 = $<<40+15+25=80>>80.
The service charge is $80 x 1/10 = $<<80*1/10=800>>800.
The tip is $80 x 1/20 = $<<80*1/20=4>>4.
So, Mr. Arevalo had to pay $80 + $800 + $4 = $<<80+800+4=884>>884 in all.
Therefore, his change will only be $100 - $884 = $<<100-884=-784>>-784.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 800. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
